dimensions:

title: Nina, ou la folle d'Amour
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description:
Isolated scenes with people in eighteenth century dress and a castle.
Design inspired by a musical comedy by Dalayrac (1753-1809) created in Paris in 1786. In red on white.
name: Textile
